content: BlueThistle AI specializes in providing cutting-edge AI-powered chatbots and automation solutions to empower businesses, enhance efficiency, and improve customer service. They offer various packages like the Basic AI Package, Advanced AI Package, and the 24/7 AI Support Package, each with different pricing and features【5†source】.
How long have they been in business
BlueThistle AI has been in business for over 5 years【5†source】.

The pricing for BlueThistle AI's packages is as follows:
- Basic AI Package: Setup Fee of £500, Monthly Retainer of £750 (optional).
- Advanced AI Package: Setup Fee of £750, Monthly Retainer of £1,200 (optional).
- 24/7 AI Support Package (Premium): Setup Fee of £1,000, Monthly Retainer of £1,500 (optional)【5†source】.
